thumb.name: Can't Say Why It's Late
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ERick.%3Cbr%3EI can't tell you why%3Cbr%3Eyour birthday card is late%3Cbr%3Ewithout compromising%3Cbr%3Ea highly sensitive%3Cbr%3Ecovert field operation%3Cbr%3Edirected by%3Cbr%3Ethe FBI.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThe story I'm using is simply%3Cbr%3Ethat I forgot it.%3Cbr%3EIf anyone asks.%3Cbr%3Ethat's what happened.%3Cbr%3E(wink wink)%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Belated Birthday%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Hope It Was Wonderful
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMissed Your%3Cbr%3ESpecial Day.%3Cbr%3ERhonda%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHope your birthday%3Cbr%3Ewas the wonderful kind of day%3Cbr%3Eyou'll remember%3Cbr%3Efor a very long time to come.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Better Late than Never
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EKaren.%3Cbr%3EI know this birthday card is%3Cbr%3E late...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI just wanted to give you%3Cbr%3Etime to catch your breath%3Cbr%3Eafter blowing out all those candles!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Belated Birthday!
